const response = await client.search({
  index: "my-index-000001",
  query: {
    match: {
      message: "GET /search",
    },
  },
  collapse: {
    field: "user.id",
    inner_hits: {
      name: "most_recent",
      size: 5,
      sort: [
        {
          "@timestamp": "desc",
        },
      ],
    },
    max_concurrent_group_searches: 4,
  },
  sort: [
    {
      "http.response.bytes": {
        order: "desc",
      },
    },
  ],
});
console.log(response);
